• Roboto Slab

    Roboto Slab is a slab serif in the Roboto family. It was designed by Christian Robertson.

    Explore

    Roboto

    Roboto is a sans-serif typeface family developed for the mobile operating system, Android.

    Explore

    Roboto Slab+Roboto

    Roboto has a dual nature. It has a mechanical skeleton and the forms are largely geometric. At the same time, the font features friendly and open curves.
